Templates.fees:
Dear (RECIPIENT NAME),

Thank you for your email & hoping you are well.

For information on payments for tuition fees, including all alternative payment methods, please see the link below:
https://www.tcd.ie/academicregistry/fees-and-payments/applicants/how-do-I-pay/

The Trinity Account details for any payments in relation to tuition fees/deposit payments are as follows:

  • Account: Trinity College No.7 Account
  • Sort Code: 90-00-17
  • Account number: 92-77-1039
  • Address: Bank of Ireland, 2 College Green, Dublin 2
  • BIC/SWIFT Code: BOFI IE 2D
  • IBAN: IE03 BOFI 9000 1792 7710 39

****Please ensure that your student number is put as the payment reference/narrative as this is critical in order to assign your payment to your account****

Kind regards,
(SENDER NAME)
Academic Registry
Templates.Start Dates:
Dear (RECIPIENT NAME),

Thank you for your email & hoping you are well.

The official start date of the teaching term for undergraduate students is now 25/09/2023.

Registration will open from August time on a programme by programme basis via the my.tcd.ie student portal, where online registration will be completed.

Once registered, your registration will be effective from 01/09/2023.

Undergraduate Orientation will take place during the week commencing 18/09/2023, please see below for more information on Orientation.
https://www.tcd.ie/students/orientation/

Teaching is currently scheduled to take place on the week commencing 25/09/2023, please refer to the Academic Year Calendar for the latest updates as start dates are subject to change.

https://www.tcd.ie/calendar/

Kind regards,
(SENDER NAME)
Academic Registry
Templates.Replace ID Card:
Dear (RECIPIENT NAME),

Thank you for your email.

come to the Academic Registry Service Desk to have your Trinity student ID card reissued, your previous card will be automatically deactivated upon re-issue.

The Service Desk is open on weekdays from 9am - 5pm.

Kind regards,
(SENDER NAME)
Academic Registry
